go_data.justification: Microtubule-associated protein is involved in stabilization of the microtubule array.
Stabilization and functional modulation of microtubules by microtubule-associated protein 4.
Microtubule-associated protein is associated with microtubules.
Doublecortin is a developmentally regulated, microtubule-associated protein expressed in migrating and differentiating neurons.
A muscle-specific variant of the microtubule-associated protein 4 (MAP4) is required for myogenesis.
